name: aroon
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Fetches the Aroon Indicator (AROON) for a given financial instrument symbol. The Aroon Indicator is used to identify trends, the beginning of a new trend, and its strength in price movements.

symbol.description: The financial instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., 'AAPL', 'EUR/USD', 'ETH/BTC').

interval.description: The time interval between data points in the time series. Supported values include '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', '1month'.

format.description: The format of the returned data. Can be 'json' or 'csv'. Defaults to 'json'.

time_period.description: The look-back period for the Aroon calculation. Defaults to 14.

outputsize.description: Default `30` when no date parameters are set, otherwise set to maximum
